choices: Somewhere on the streets in retroville.
1.content: Where do you wake up? You are half an inch tall.
1.title: You wake up shrunk in retroville.

11.content: As your eyes adjust, you realize that your in Jimmy Neutrons lab, and that your also miniaturized. Confused, you wonder how you got here and more importantly how you shrunk. As you think about these two questions, you hear something behind you. Terrified, you wonder what it is. You turn and see...
11.title: Jimmy's lab

113.content: You turn around and see nothing there. You exhale in relief as you look around the lab. You then see many of jimmys gadgets like a shrink ray, a jetpack and even some of his designs for new inventions. You suddenly get a grin on your face as you get an idea how to use your miniature state to your advantage. You first het for the shrink ray and point it at the jetpack. You shrink it to about your size so it will fit you. You then put the jetpack on and start to blast off to start your (literally) little adventure around retroville. You fly outside the lab and have an amazing view. You then see the home of jimmy neutron and his parents. Other side you see the home of Cindy vortex who is jimmy's rival across the street. You think about flying to one of these houses. You decide to fly to...
113.title: Nobody

1132.content: You fly over to the vortex home and see Cindy at home in her room. You notice Cindy's window is open and fly right in. She seems to be unaware of you so far. You see her doing some of her homework from school while eating some popcorn and purple flurp. You decide to mess with her as you fly around her room like an annoying pest. You start to fly around her head as she starts to notice you which cause her to flinch and shriek a little bit. "Eww!! A bug!" she shouts. Cindy then gets a fly swatter and tries to smack down the fly (you). She raises the fly swatter and gets ready to swat you does she hit or miss?
1132.title: Cindy Vortex's house

11321.content: Cindy accualy makes contact with you first try, causing your jetpack to go berserk as you start to spin-out of control. It sputters and then stops causing you to fall directly...
11321.title: Yes hit

113212.content: You fall into cindys popcorn. You feel dizzy after that hit and fall and realize your in cindys popcorn! You then hear Cindy say, "looks like I got him!" Looks like she was unaware that your in her popcorn. You had to act fast and try to escape her snack. Suddenly she's got her hand in her popcorn with you in the pile. She brings it to her mouth and opens it tossing the popcorn and you in her mouth. You had to get out of that popcorn and out of harms way as cindys teeth start coming down. You jump to safety onto her tongue as you watch her crunching that corn. She then starts to swallow the corn along with you. You start falling towards her throat where her uvula. You had one chance and jumped toward her uvula and managed to grab ahold of ot. Outside Cindy starts coughing causing a shake in her mouth with her uvula swinging back and forth making it difficult to hold on to. She then grabs her drink and stats chugging it Dow. Inside you were met with a tidal wave of purple trying to pluck you off her uvula. Do you manage to hang on?
113212.title: In her popcorn

1132121.content: You manage to hang on durring the tidle wave of purple soda and when Cindy realized the soda didn't work she started to cough more and you lose your grip and go flying out of her mouth and onto something soft...
1132121.title: Yes

11321213.content: Are they any of the following?
11321213.title: Her clothes

info.brief_description: Have fun being shrunk in Retroville!
info.description:
Have fun being shrunk in Retroville!

All is allowed. You are yourself (no name for you [The tiny] )

Do not end the story at all. Keep it going.

Rules will be added when i have time.

I copied and pasted some of the chapters from the original one. But recently it vanished from my fav list so im now making this public. If the original owner puts it back up I will make this private again.
